text: Gianfranco Fini (born 3 January 1952) is an Italian politician. He was the president of the Italian Chamber of Deputies from 2008 to 2013. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Italy) Category:Italian journalists Category:Politicians from Emilia-Romagna Category:People from Bologna
title: Gianfranco Fini
